description.en:
The sea hath its pearls,
the heaven hath its stars.
description.zh-Hans:
大海蕴藏着它的珍珠
蓝天怀抱着它的星辰
description.zh-Hant:
大海蘊藏著它的珍珠
藍天懷抱著它的星辰
description.ja:
The sea hath its pearls,
the heaven hath its stars.
description.es:
The sea hath its pearls,
the heaven hath its stars.
description.ko:
The sea hath its pearls,
the heaven hath its stars.
description.ru:
The sea hath its pearls,
the heaven hath its stars.

description.en:
The wind alone it is makes every sound, 
Shaking down crystals on the leaves below.
description.zh-Hans:
风发出每一个声音
摇动每一片叶子上的水晶
description.zh-Hant:
風發出每一個聲音
搖動每一片葉子上的水晶
description.ja:
The wind alone it is makes every sound, 
Shaking down crystals on the leaves below.
description.es:
The wind alone it is makes every sound, 
Shaking down crystals on the leaves below.
description.ko:
The wind alone it is makes every sound, 
Shaking down crystals on the leaves below.
description.ru:
The wind alone it is makes every sound, 
Shaking down crystals on the leaves below.

sub_title.ja: この葉に落ちた雨の雫

description.en:
Angels of rain and lightning
there are spread on the blue surface of thine aery surge.
description.zh-Hans:
这是雨和电的先遣
它们飘落在磅礴的、蔚蓝的波涛之上
description.zh-Hant:
這是雨和電的先遣
它們飄落在磅礴的、蔚藍的波濤之上
description.ja:
Angels of rain and lightning
there are spread on the blue surface of thine aery surge.
description.es:
Angels of rain and lightning
there are spread on the blue surface of thine aery surge.
description.ko:
Angels of rain and lightning
there are spread on the blue surface of thine aery surge.
description.ru:
Angels of rain and lightning
there are spread on the blue surface of thine aery surge.

sub_title.en: Thunders and clouds at the skylines
sub_title.es: Truenos y nubes en el horizonte

description.en:
If you try to understand the world in a dialectics way,
you will find that ephemeral is eternal.
description.zh-Hans:
流逝的不是时间
是我们
description.zh-Hant:
流逝的不是時間
是我們
description.ja:
If you try to understand the world in a dialectics way,
you will find that ephemeral is eternal.
description.es:
If you try to understand the world in a dialectics way,
you will find that ephemeral is eternal.
description.ko:
If you try to understand the world in a dialectics way,
you will find that ephemeral is eternal.
description.ru:
If you try to understand the world in a dialectics way,
you will find that ephemeral is eternal.

description.en:
Once upon a time--imagine! 
My heart 
felt like a loaf of fresh-baked bread

Free for April 30th to May 7th
description.zh-Hans:
有时候觉得我的心
像是刚烤好的
面包一样
description.zh-Hant:
有時候覺得我的心
像是剛烤好的
麵包一樣
description.ja:
Once upon a time--imagine! 
My heart 
felt like a loaf of fresh-baked bread

Free for April 30th to May 7th
description.es:
Once upon a time--imagine! 
My heart 
felt like a loaf of fresh-baked bread

Free for April 30th to May 7th
description.ko:
Once upon a time--imagine! 
My heart 
felt like a loaf of fresh-baked bread

Free for April 30th to May 7th
description.ru:
Once upon a time--imagine! 
My heart 
felt like a loaf of fresh-baked bread

Free for April 30th to May 7th

description.en:
We're so soft
yet rough
and jungle wild
description.zh-Hans:
我们既温柔
又刚硬
还有原始的野蛮
description.zh-Hant:
我們既溫柔
又剛硬
還有原始的野蠻
description.ja:
We're so soft
yet rough 
and jungle wild
description.es:
We're so soft 
yet rough 
and jungle wild
description.ko:
We're so soft 
yet rough 
and jungle wild
description.ru:
We're so soft 
yet rough 
and jungle wild

description.en:
The ice on the glacier is melting,
and the snow on the snowy mountain is vanishing.
description.zh-Hans:
冰在冰川上倾泻
雪在雪山下消融
description.zh-Hant:
冰在冰川上傾瀉
雪在雪山下消融
description.ja:
The ice on the glacier is melting,
and the snow on the snowy mountain is vanishing.
description.es:
The ice on the glacier is melting,
and the snow on the snowy mountain is vanishing.
description.ko:
The ice on the glacier is melting,
and the snow on the snowy mountain is vanishing.
description.ru:
The ice on the glacier is melting,
and the snow on the snowy mountain is vanishing.

description.en: I was surrounded by stars and was floating without much control.
description.zh-Hans:
天是黑的
星星是圆的
自己好像在星群之中
没有支撑
description.zh-Hant:
天是黑的
星星是圓的
自己好像在星群之中
沒有支撐
description.ja: I was surrounded by stars and was floating without much control.
description.es: I was surrounded by stars and was floating without much control.
description.ko: I was surrounded by stars and was floating without much control.
description.ru: I was surrounded by stars and was floating without much control.

description.en:
The river is high and the stream is strong, and the grass is green and tall.
And I fain would think that this world of ours is a good world after all.
description.zh-Hans:
河流涨满 山溪欢快
原野青草蔓生
我不禁想到这毕竟是个美好的世界
description.zh-Hant:
河流漲滿 山溪歡快
原野青草蔓生
我不禁想到這畢竟是個美好的世界
description.ja:
The river is high and the stream is strong, and the grass is green and tall.
And I fain would think that this world of ours is a good world after all.
description.es:
The river is high and the stream is strong, and the grass is green and tall.
And I fain would think that this world of ours is a good world after all.
description.ko:
The river is high and the stream is strong, and the grass is green and tall.
And I fain would think that this world of ours is a good world after all.
description.ru:
The river is high and the stream is strong, and the grass is green and tall.
And I fain would think that this world of ours is a good world after all.

description.en:
In all our sunny world
I just want a bench in the garden
description.zh-Hans:
在这五光十色的世界里
我要的只是
公园里的一把长椅
description.zh-Hant:
在這五光十色的世界裡
我要的只是
公園裡的一把長椅
description.ja:
In all our sunny world
I just want a bench in the garden
description.es:
In all our sunny world
I just want a bench in the garden
description.ko:
In all our sunny world
I just want a bench in the garden
description.ru:
In all our sunny world
I just want a bench in the garden

sub_title.en: Hidden in the center of the city
sub_title.ja: Hidden in the center of the city
sub_title.es: Hidden in the center of the city
sub_title.ko: Hidden in the center of the city
sub_title.ru: Hidden in the center of the city

description.en:
It's a chilly morning in the reed field 
not too far from the city, I stand in the wind 
imagining you going through crowds
description.zh-Hans:
在离城市不远的
芦苇地带，我站在风中
想象你正穿过人群
description.zh-Hant:
在離城市不遠的
蘆葦地帶，我站在風中
想象你正穿過人群
description.ja:
It's a chilly morning in the reed field 
not too far from the city, I stand in the wind 
imagining you going through crowds
description.es:
It's a chilly morning in the reed field 
not too far from the city, I stand in the wind 
imagining you going through crowds
description.ko:
It's a chilly morning in the reed field 
not too far from the city, I stand in the wind 
imagining you going through crowds
description.ru:
It's a chilly morning in the reed field 
not too far from the city, I stand in the wind 
imagining you going through crowds

sub_title.ja: ガサガサと風に吹かれる葦

description.en:
The more basic the color,
the more inward,
the more pure.
description.zh-Hans:
色彩越简单
就越内敛
越纯粹
description.zh-Hant:
色彩越簡單
就越內斂
越純粹
description.ja:
The more basic the color,
the more inward,
the more pure.
description.es:
The more basic the color,
the more inward,
the more pure.
description.ko:
The more basic the color,
the more inward,
the more pure.
description.ru:
The more basic the color,
the more inward,
the more pure.

description.en: Every substantial, lasting success that he achieves always comes into being only in those few rare moments of inspiration.
description.zh-Hans:
那些显赫不朽的艺术杰作
往往诞生于艺术家们
灵感乍现的难得瞬间
description.zh-Hant:
那些顯赫不朽的藝術傑作
往往誕生於藝術家們
靈感乍現的難得瞬間
description.ja: Every substantial, lasting success that he achieves always comes into being only in those few rare moments of inspiration.
description.es: Every substantial, lasting success that he achieves always comes into being only in those few rare moments of inspiration.
description.ko: Every substantial, lasting success that he achieves always comes into being only in those few rare moments of inspiration.
description.ru: Every substantial, lasting success that he achieves always comes into being only in those few rare moments of inspiration.

description.en: My evening came among the alien trees and spoke in a language which my morning stars did not know.
description.zh-Hans:
黄昏从陌生的树林中走来
说着晨星听不懂的话语
description.zh-Hant:
黃昏從陌生的樹林中走來
說著晨星聽不懂的話語
description.ja: My evening came among the alien trees and spoke in a language which my morning stars did not know.
description.es: My evening came among the alien trees and spoke in a language which my morning stars did not know.
description.ko: My evening came among the alien trees and spoke in a language which my morning stars did not know.
description.ru: My evening came among the alien trees and spoke in a language which my morning stars did not know.

sub_title.en: The winding track leading to quiet retreats
sub_title.ja: The winding track leading to quiet retreats
sub_title.es: The winding track leading to quiet retreats
sub_title.ko: The winding track leading to quiet retreats
sub_title.ru: The winding track leading to quiet retreats

description.en: “Sustaining all life on Earth”: Tide and Colorful Nature Films customized a limited offer for World Wildlife Day in 2020. Downloading valid till March, 22nd, 2020.
description.zh-Hans:
维护全球生命共同体——2020 世界野生动植物日限定场景，由潮汐与缤纷自然特别呈现。
下载有效期至 2020 年 3 月 22 日。
description.zh-Hant:
維護全球生命共同體——2020 世界野生動植物日限定場景，由潮汐與繽紛自然特別呈現。
下載有效期至 2020 年 3 月 22 日。
description.ja: “Sustaining all life on Earth”: Tide and Colorful Nature Films customized a limited offer for World Wildlife Day in 2020. Downloading valid till March, 22nd, 2020.
description.es: “Sustaining all life on Earth”: Tide and Colorful Nature Films customized a limited offer for World Wildlife Day in 2020. Downloading valid till March, 22nd, 2020.
description.ko: “Sustaining all life on Earth”: Tide and Colorful Nature Films customized a limited offer for World Wildlife Day in 2020. Downloading valid till March, 22nd, 2020.
description.ru: “Sustaining all life on Earth”: Tide and Colorful Nature Films customized a limited offer for World Wildlife Day in 2020. Downloading valid till March, 22nd, 2020.

description.en:
Cicadas stopped singing.
When they hear the wood chopping from the mountains afar, they sing again.
description.zh-Hans:
蝉声止息
远山伐木丁丁
蝉又鸣起来
description.zh-Hant:
蟬聲止息
遠山伐木丁丁
蟬又鳴起來
description.ja:
Cicadas stopped singing.
When they hear the wood chopping from the mountains afar, they sing again.
description.es:
Cicadas stopped singing.
When they hear the wood chopping from the mountains afar, they sing again.
description.ko:
Cicadas stopped singing.
When they hear the wood chopping from the mountains afar, they sing again.
description.ru:
Cicadas stopped singing.
When they hear the wood chopping from the mountains afar, they sing again.

description.en:
Bright sunlight shines on the snowy world,
looped cloud floats above the valley.
Everything anew becomes heat and light,
casting away shadow and sorrow.
description.zh-Hans:
雪星上阳光灿然
山谷间云彩结环
一切皆新，是热、是光
没有阴影，没有忧伤
description.zh-Hant:
雪星上陽光燦然
山谷間雲彩結環
一切皆新，是熱、是光
沒有陰影，沒有憂傷
description.ja:
Bright sunlight shines on the snowy world,
looped cloud floats above the valley.
Everything anew becomes heat and light,
casting away shadow and sorrow.
description.es:
Bright sunlight shines on the snowy world,
looped cloud floats above the valley.
Everything anew becomes heat and light,
casting away shadow and sorrow.
description.ko:
Bright sunlight shines on the snowy world,
looped cloud floats above the valley.
Everything anew becomes heat and light,
casting away shadow and sorrow.
description.ru:
Bright sunlight shines on the snowy world,
looped cloud floats above the valley.
Everything anew becomes heat and light,
casting away shadow and sorrow.

description.en:
Bamboos stand along the valley,
and vines caress my cloak with glee.
description.zh-Hans:
绿竹入幽径
青萝拂行衣
description.zh-Hant:
綠竹入幽徑
青蘿拂行衣
description.ja:
Bamboos stand along the valley,
and vines caress my cloak with glee.
description.es:
Bamboos stand along the valley,
and vines caress my cloak with glee.
description.ko:
Bamboos stand along the valley,
and vines caress my cloak with glee.
description.ru:
Bamboos stand along the valley,
and vines caress my cloak with glee.

sub_title.en: Sitting in the rustling bamboo forest
sub_title.ja: ざわめいた竹林に一人で座る
sub_title.es: Sentando en un bosque de bambú surusante
sub_title.ko: 살랑살랑하는 바람이 불고 있는 대나무 숲에서 앉아 있다

description.en:
Staying indoor keeps you away from heavier rain,   
but you still might be washed away
by your aging and influencing crowd.
description.zh-Hans:
雨下大了
理应是你在屋里
但我怕你被其他东西淋湿
岁月之类，人群之类
description.zh-Hant:
雨下大了
理應是你在屋裡
但我怕你被其他東西淋溼
歲月之類，人群之類
description.ja:
Staying indoor keeps you away from heavier rain,   
but you still might be washed away
by your aging and influencing crowd.
description.es:
Staying indoor keeps you away from heavier rain,   
but you still might be washed away
by your aging and influencing crowd.
description.ko:
Staying indoor keeps you away from heavier rain,   
but you still might be washed away
by your aging and influencing crowd.
description.ru:
Staying indoor keeps you away from heavier rain,   
but you still might be washed away
by your aging and influencing crowd.

sub_title.ja: 窓の外で雨が降っている

description.en:
Every second I spend on writing,
dawn is approaching,
and night is leaving.
description.zh-Hans:
此刻，我每多写下一个字
这宝贵的黑夜都可能被
黎明删除
description.zh-Hant:
此刻，我每多寫下一個字
這寶貴的黑夜都可能被
黎明刪除
description.ja:
Every second I spend on writing,
dawn is approaching,
and night is leaving.
description.es:
Every second I spend on writing,
dawn is approaching,
and night is leaving.
description.ko:
Every second I spend on writing,
dawn is approaching,
and night is leaving.
description.ru:
Every second I spend on writing,
dawn is approaching,
and night is leaving.

sub_title.ja: 一台の古いタイプライター

description.en:
I want to touch everything,
I want to wash every dish,
in the kitchen sink like a newborn.
description.zh-Hans:
我想要触摸每件东西
我想要洗每个盘子
让它们在洗碗池中宛如新生
description.zh-Hant:
我想要觸控每件東西
我想要洗每個盤子
讓它們在洗碗池中宛如新生
description.ja:
I want to touch everything,
I want to wash every dish,
in the kitchen sink like a newborn.
description.es:
I want to touch everything,
I want to wash every dish,
in the kitchen sink like a newborn.
description.ko:
I want to touch everything,
I want to wash every dish,
in the kitchen sink like a newborn.
description.ru:
I want to touch everything,
I want to wash every dish,
in the kitchen sink like a newborn.

sub_title.ja: 食器洗い機で踊る碗とお皿

description.en:
My youth has been nothing, 
but a tenebrous storm,
Pierced now and then ,
by rays of brilliant sunshine.
description.zh-Hans:
我的青春是一场晦暗的风暴
星星点点
漏下明晃晃的阳光
description.zh-Hant:
我的青春是一場晦暗的風暴
星星點點
漏下明晃晃的陽光
description.ja:
My youth has been nothing, 
but a tenebrous storm,
Pierced now and then ,
by rays of brilliant sunshine.
description.es:
My youth has been nothing, 
but a tenebrous storm,
Pierced now and then ,
by rays of brilliant sunshine.
description.ko:
My youth has been nothing, 
but a tenebrous storm,
Pierced now and then ,
by rays of brilliant sunshine.
description.ru:
My youth has been nothing, 
but a tenebrous storm,
Pierced now and then ,
by rays of brilliant sunshine.

sub_title.en: A basketball court around the corner
sub_title.ja: 街角のバスケットコート

description.en:
I have been one acquainted with the night.
I have outwalked the furthest city light.
description.zh-Hans:
这样的夜晚似曾相识
如在城市华灯下走过最遥远的路程
description.zh-Hant:
這樣的夜晚似曾相識
如在城市華燈下走過最遙遠的路程
description.ja:
I have been one acquainted with the night.
I have outwalked the furthest city light.
description.es:
I have been one acquainted with the night.
I have outwalked the furthest city light.
description.ko:
I have been one acquainted with the night.
I have outwalked the furthest city light.
description.ru:
I have been one acquainted with the night.
I have outwalked the furthest city light.

sub_title.en: Staring at the city in night
sub_title.ja: 夜空の下の都市を見つめる
sub_title.es: Mirando a la ciudad en la noche

description.en:
We are like islands in the sea,
separate on the surface but connected in the deep.
description.zh-Hans:
我们宛如海上散落的孤岛
遥遥相望，却在深处相依
description.zh-Hant:
我們宛如海上散落的孤島
遙遙相望，卻在深處相依
description.ja:
We are like islands in the sea,
separate on the surface but connected in the deep.
description.es:
We are like islands in the sea,
separate on the surface but connected in the deep.
description.ko:
We are like islands in the sea,
separate on the surface but connected in the deep.
description.ru:
We are like islands in the sea,
separate on the surface but connected in the deep.

description.en:
Close the book, still feeling what it was like
to dwell in that light.
description.zh-Hans:
当你从书页上抬眼、然后合上书本
依然感觉到，住在那片光里
description.zh-Hant:
當你從書頁上擡眼，然後合上書本
依然感覺到，住在那片光裡
description.ja:
Close the book, still feeling what it was like
to dwell in that light.
description.es:
Close the book, still feeling what it was like
to dwell in that light.
description.ko:
Close the book, still feeling what it was like
to dwell in that light.
description.ru:
Close the book, still feeling what it was like
to dwell in that light.

sub_title.es: Regresar al tiempo de la escuela

description.en: Time bursts into flame and disappears.
description.zh-Hans:
时间迸出火焰
又消失无踪
description.zh-Hant:
時間迸出火焰
又消失無蹤
description.ja: Time bursts into flame and disappears.
description.es: Time bursts into flame and disappears.
description.ko: Time bursts into flame and disappears.
description.ru: Time bursts into flame and disappears.

description.en:
A tree that may in summer wear.
A nest of robins in her hair.
description.zh-Hans:
树木那一袭夏日的秀发
是知更鸟栖息繁衍的家
description.zh-Hant:
樹木那一襲夏日的秀髮
是知更鳥棲息繁衍的家
description.ja:
A tree that may in summer wear.
A nest of robins in her hair.
description.es:
A tree that may in summer wear.
A nest of robins in her hair.
description.ko:
A tree that may in summer wear.
A nest of robins in her hair.
description.ru:
A tree that may in summer wear.
A nest of robins in her hair.

description.en:
Ancient woods offer no human trails; 
Deep in the peaks whence comes the echoing bell?
description.zh-Hans:
古木无人径
深山何处钟
description.zh-Hant:
古木無人徑
深山何處鐘
description.ja:
Ancient woods offer no human trails; 
Deep in the peaks whence comes the echoing bell?
description.es:
Ancient woods offer no human trails; 
Deep in the peaks whence comes the echoing bell?
description.ko: Ancient woods offer no human trails; Deep in the peaks whence comes the echoing bell?
description.ru:
Ancient woods offer no human trails; 
Deep in the peaks whence comes the echoing bell?

sub_title.en: The sound of distant lingering bells
sub_title.es: El sonido de las campanas distantes

description.en:
On the green field of barley and of rye,
glitters the snow and sunlight.
description.zh-Hans:
在青麦地上跑着
雪和太阳的光芒
description.zh-Hant:
在青麥地上跑著
雪和太陽的光芒
description.ja:
On the green field of barley and of rye,
glitters the snow and sunlight.
description.es:
On the green field of barley and of rye,
glitters the snow and sunlight.
description.ko:
On the green field of barley and of rye,
glitters the snow and sunlight.
description.ru:
On the green field of barley and of rye,
glitters the snow and sunlight.

sub_title.en: A golden barley billowing in the breeze
sub_title.ja: どこまでも広がる金色の麦の波
sub_title.es: Una cebada dorada ondeando en la brisa.

description.en:
Until the light overtook me
and folded up time.
description.zh-Hans:
直到光追赶上我
把时间叠起
description.zh-Hant:
直到光追趕上我
把時間疊起
description.ja:
Until the light overtook me
and folded up time.
description.es:
Until the light overtook me
and folded up time.
description.ko:
Until the light overtook me
and folded up time.
description.ru:
Until the light overtook me
and folded up time.

sub_title.en: At the edge of the light

description.en:
White in the moon the long road lies.	
That leads me from my love.
description.zh-Hans:
远道而来是蔓延的月色
沿着满地白霜，向我所爱的一切道别
description.zh-Hant:
遠道而來是蔓延的月色
沿著滿地白霜，向我所愛的一切道別
description.ja:
White in the moon the long road lies.	
That leads me from my love.
description.es:
White in the moon the long road lies.	
That leads me from my love.
description.ko:
White in the moon the long road lies.	
That leads me from my love.
description.ru:
White in the moon the long road lies.	
That leads me from my love.

description.en:
My heart, the bird of the wilderness, 
has found its sky in your eyes.
description.zh-Hans:
我的心是旷野的鸟
在你的眼睛里找到了它的天空
description.zh-Hant:
我的心是曠野的鳥
在你的眼睛裡找到了它的天空
description.ja:
My heart, the bird of the wilderness, 
has found its sky in your eyes.
description.es:
My heart, the bird of the wilderness, 
has found its sky in your eyes.
description.ko:
My heart, the bird of the wilderness, 
has found its sky in your eyes.
description.ru:
My heart, the bird of the wilderness, 
has found its sky in your eyes.

sub_title.ja: 誰もいない静まり返った曠野

description.en:
I believe there is a song 
that is stranger than wind.
description.zh-Hans:
我相信有一曲
比风更陌生的歌
description.zh-Hant:
我相信有一曲
比風更陌生的歌
description.ja:
I believe there is a song 
that is stranger than wind.
description.es:
I believe there is a song 
that is stranger than wind.
description.ko:
I believe there is a song 
that is stranger than wind.
description.ru:
I believe there is a song 
that is stranger than wind.

sub_title.ja: 風に吹き抜けられた旅
sub_title.es: Un viaje a través del viento

description.en:
Let the moon shine on thee in thy solitary walk; 
And let the misty-mountain winds be free to blow against thee.
description.zh-Hans:
当你孤独地行走时
月光笼罩，山风轻抚
description.zh-Hant:
當你孤獨地行走時
月光籠罩，山風輕撫
description.ja:
Let the moon shine on thee in thy solitary walk; 
And let the misty-mountain winds be free to blow against thee.
description.es:
Let the moon shine on thee in thy solitary walk; 
And let the misty-mountain winds be free to blow against thee.
description.ko:
Let the moon shine on thee in thy solitary walk; 
And let the misty-mountain winds be free to blow against thee.
description.ru:
Let the moon shine on thee in thy solitary walk; 
And let the misty-mountain winds be free to blow against thee.

description.en:
Let the rain kiss you.
Let the rain beat upon your head with silver liquid drops.
Let the rain sing you a lullaby.
description.zh-Hans:
烟雨微微
一片笙歌醉里归
description.zh-Hant:
煙雨微微
一片笙歌醉裡歸
description.ja:
Let the rain kiss you.
Let the rain beat upon your head with silver liquid drops.
Let the rain sing you a lullaby.
description.es:
Let the rain kiss you.
Let the rain beat upon your head with silver liquid drops.
Let the rain sing you a lullaby.
description.ko:
Let the rain kiss you.
Let the rain beat upon your head with silver liquid drops.
Let the rain sing you a lullaby.
description.ru:
Let the rain kiss you.
Let the rain beat upon your head with silver liquid drops.
Let the rain sing you a lullaby.

description.en:
I wandered lonely as a cloud
that floats on high o'er vales and hills.
description.zh-Hans:
我独自漫游
如云飘荡过高山低谷
description.zh-Hant:
我獨自漫遊
如雲飄蕩过高山低谷
description.ja:
I wandered lonely as a cloud
that floats on high o'er vales and hills.
description.es:
I wandered lonely as a cloud
that floats on high o'er vales and hills.
description.ko:
I wandered lonely as a cloud
that floats on high o'er vales and hills.
description.ru:
I wandered lonely as a cloud
that floats on high o'er vales and hills.

description.en:
Ask my pen,
it governs me，
I govern not it．
description.zh-Hans:
问问我的笔
它支配我
我支配不了它
description.zh-Hant:
問問我的筆
它支配我
我支配不了它
description.ja:
Ask my pen,
it governs me，
I govern not it．
description.es:
Ask my pen,
it governs me，
I govern not it．
description.ko:
Ask my pen,
it governs me，
I govern not it．
description.ru:
Ask my pen,
it governs me，
I govern not it．

sub_title.ja: 紙の上に流れる鉛筆のストローク
sub_title.es: Trazos de lápiz que fluyen sobre el papel

description.zh-Hans:
在洞中
我凝视着你
却互不相识
description.zh-Hant:
在洞中
我凝視著你
卻互不相識

sub_title.en: A world hidden in the cave
sub_title.es: Un mundo escondido en la cueva

description.en:
River, flow the vale along.
Without rest or ease.
description.zh-Hans:
河水淙淙，沿着山谷流淌
既不会停下，也不会匆忙
description.zh-Hant:
河水淙淙，沿着山谷流淌
既不會停下，也不會匆忙
description.ja:
River, flow the vale along.
Without rest or ease.
description.es:
River, flow the vale along.
Without rest or ease.
description.ko:
River, flow the vale along.
Without rest or ease.
description.ru:
River, flow the vale along.
Without rest or ease.

description.en:
An instant in the wind
But not for long to hold each desperate choice.
description.zh-Hans:
它的声音在风中一闪即逝
短促得来不及抓住每次的抉择
description.zh-Hant:
它的聲音在風中一閃即逝
短促得來不及抓住每次的抉擇
description.ja:
An instant in the wind
But not for long to hold each desperate choice.
description.es:
An instant in the wind
But not for long to hold each desperate choice.
description.ko:
An instant in the wind
But not for long to hold each desperate choice.
description.ru:
An instant in the wind
But not for long to hold each desperate choice.

sub_title.ja: 静止している一束の静電気

description.en:
The Past and Present here unite
beneath Time's flowing tide,
like footprints hidden by a brook,
but seen on either side.
description.zh-Hans:
明月松间照
清泉石上流
description.zh-Hant:
明月松間照
清泉石上流
description.ja:
The Past and Present here unite
beneath Time's flowing tide,
like footprints hidden by a brook,
but seen on either side.
description.es:
The Past and Present here unite
beneath Time's flowing tide,
like footprints hidden by a brook,
but seen on either side.
description.ko:
The Past and Present here unite
beneath Time's flowing tide,
like footprints hidden by a brook,
but seen on either side.
description.ru:
The Past and Present here unite
beneath Time's flowing tide,
like footprints hidden by a brook,
but seen on either side.

sub_title.ja: 澄んだ湧き水が森へ流れる
sub_title.es: El agua clara de manantial fluye a través del bosque

description.en: Do not go into that good night gently.
description.zh-Hans: 不要温和地走入那个良夜
description.zh-Hant: 不要溫和地走入那個良夜
description.ja: Do not go into that good night gently.
description.es: Do not go into that good night gently.
description.ko: Do not go into that good night gently.
description.ru: Do not go into that good night gently.

sub_title.es: Fuego de invierno en la habitación

description.en:
Hide nothing, for time, 
which sees all and hears all, exposes all.
description.zh-Hans:
对时间不必有隐瞒
它洞晓一切，揭示一切
description.zh-Hant:
對時間不必有隱瞞
它洞曉一切，揭示一切
description.ja:
Hide nothing, for time, 
which sees all and hears all, exposes all.
description.es:
Hide nothing, for time, 
which sees all and hears all, exposes all.
description.ko:
Hide nothing, for time, 
which sees all and hears all, exposes all.
description.ru:
Hide nothing, for time, 
which sees all and hears all, exposes all.

sub_title.ja: 時が耳元で流れていくことを聞いた

description.en:
Mountains racing to the moon.
The moment of their start recorded on the startling, 
ripped canvas of the sky.
description.zh-Hans:
奔月的群峰
永远静止的起跑
背对突然裂开的天空
description.zh-Hant:
奔月的群峰
永遠靜止的起跑
背對突然裂開的天空
description.ja:
Mountains racing to the moon.
The moment of their start recorded on the startling, 
ripped canvas of the sky.
description.es:
Mountains racing to the moon.
The moment of their start recorded on the startling, 
ripped canvas of the sky.
description.ko:
Mountains racing to the moon.
The moment of their start recorded on the startling, 
ripped canvas of the sky.
description.ru:
Mountains racing to the moon.
The moment of their start recorded on the startling, 
ripped canvas of the sky.

sub_title.en: The closest place to the sky
sub_title.es: El lugar más cercano al cielo

description.en: A quite heart naturally leads to coolness.
description.zh-Hans: 心静自然凉
description.zh-Hant: 心靜自然涼
description.ja: A quite heart naturally leads to coolness.
description.es: A quite heart naturally leads to coolness.
description.ko: A quite heart naturally leads to coolness.
description.ru: A quite heart naturally leads to coolness.

description.en:
Islands and islands,
shattered into a thousand pieces,
summer's sea.
description.zh-Hans:
夏之海浪荡
大岛小岛
碎成千万状
description.zh-Hant:
夏之海浪蕩
大島小島
碎成千萬狀
description.ja:
Islands and islands,
shattered into a thousand pieces,
summer's sea.
description.es:
Islands and islands,
shattered into a thousand pieces,
summer's sea.
description.ko:
Islands and islands,
shattered into a thousand pieces,
summer's sea.
description.ru:
Islands and islands,
shattered into a thousand pieces,
summer's sea.

description.en:
The wind moves quietly among the trees.
Emptiness rests. The water is still.
description.zh-Hans:
风在树木之间缓缓滑行
休憩的空寂里，湖水仍平静
description.zh-Hant:
風在樹木之間緩緩滑行
休憩的空寂裡，湖水仍平靜
description.ja:
The wind moves quietly among the trees.
Emptiness rests. The water is still.
description.es:
The wind moves quietly among the trees.
Emptiness rests. The water is still.
description.ko:
The wind moves quietly among the trees.
Emptiness rests. The water is still.
description.ru:
The wind moves quietly among the trees.
Emptiness rests. The water is still.

description.en:
To move, to breathe, to fly, to float,
To gain all while you give,
To roam the roads of lands remote.
description.zh-Hans:
去移动，去呼吸，去飞翔，去漂浮
去付出的同时获得一切
去遥远的大地上走漫长的路
description.zh-Hant:
去移動，去呼吸，去飛翔，去漂浮
去付出的同時獲得一切
去遙遠的大地上走漫長的路
description.ja:
To move, to breathe, to fly, to float,
To gain all while you give,
To roam the roads of lands remote.
description.es:
To move, to breathe, to fly, to float,
To gain all while you give,
To roam the roads of lands remote.
description.ko:
To move, to breathe, to fly, to float,
To gain all while you give,
To roam the roads of lands remote.
description.ru:
To move, to breathe, to fly, to float,
To gain all while you give,
To roam the roads of lands remote.

description.en:
I have been here before,
but when or how I cannot tell.
description.zh-Hans:
我一定到过此地
何时、何因，却不知详
description.zh-Hant:
我一定到過此地
何時、何因，卻不知詳
description.ja:
I have been here before,
but when or how I cannot tell.
description.es:
I have been here before,
but when or how I cannot tell.
description.ko:
I have been here before,
but when or how I cannot tell.
description.ru:
I have been here before,
but when or how I cannot tell.

sub_title.ja: 午後の賑やかなカフェ
sub_title.ru: Загруженное кафе во второй половине дня

description.en:
I have spread my dreams under your feet;
Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.
description.zh-Hans:
我把梦铺展在你的脚下
轻一点啊，因为你脚踩的是我的梦
description.zh-Hant:
我把夢鋪展在你的腳下
輕一點啊，因為你腳踩的是我的夢
description.ja:
I have spread my dreams under your feet;
Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.
description.es:
I have spread my dreams under your feet;
Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.
description.ko:
I have spread my dreams under your feet;
Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.
description.ru:
I have spread my dreams under your feet;
Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.

description.en:
With my blue umbrella,
take me away from the crowd if you want.
description.zh-Hans:
带上那不可思议的蓝色雨伞
如果你愿意，我们一起从人群中远走
description.zh-Hant:
帶上那不可思議的藍色雨傘
如果你願意，我們一起從人群中遠走
description.ja:
With my blue umbrella,
take me away from the crowd if you want.
description.es:
With my blue umbrella,
take me away from the crowd if you want.
description.ko:
With my blue umbrella,
take me away from the crowd if you want.
description.ru:
With my blue umbrella,
take me away from the crowd if you want.

sub_title.en: Walk in the rain with an umbrella
sub_title.ja: 傘をさして雨の中で歩く
sub_title.es: Camine en las lluvias con un paraguas

description.en:
The afternoon grows light because at last
abruptly a minutely shredded rain is falling.
description.zh-Hans:
突然间黄昏变得明亮
因为此刻正有细雨在落下
description.zh-Hant:
突然間黃昏變得明亮
因為此刻正有細雨在落下
description.ja:
The afternoon grows light because at last
abruptly a minutely shredded rain is falling.
description.es:
The afternoon grows light because at last
abruptly a minutely shredded rain is falling.
description.ko:
The afternoon grows light because at last
abruptly a minutely shredded rain is falling.
description.ru:
The afternoon grows light because at last
abruptly a minutely shredded rain is falling.

description.en:
Who can sing the windy desert,
in which the cliffs fell down,
in which the lofty stars went out,
in which the rivers of time dried up.
description.zh-Hans:
在那里悬崖崩塌了
高高的星星熄灭了
时间的河流在其中干涸
description.zh-Hant:
在那裡懸崖崩塌了
高高的星星熄滅了
時間的河流在其中乾涸
description.ja:
Who can sing the windy desert,
in which the cliffs fell down,
in which the lofty stars went out,
in which the rivers of time dried up.
description.es:
Who can sing the windy desert,
in which the cliffs fell down,
in which the lofty stars went out,
in which the rivers of time dried up.
description.ko:
Who can sing the windy desert,
in which the cliffs fell down,
in which the lofty stars went out,
in which the rivers of time dried up.
description.ru:
Who can sing the windy desert,
in which the cliffs fell down,
in which the lofty stars went out,
in which the rivers of time dried up.

sub_title.ja: 広大な海のような砂漠

description.en:
It breaks in bright crescendo.
It climbs in warmth, declines in peace,
and ends in velvet splendor.
description.zh-Hans:
在明亮的渐强中破裂
在温暖中攀登
在和平中衰落
以天鹅绒般的华丽收尾
description.zh-Hant:
在明亮的漸強中破裂
在溫暖中攀登
在和平中衰落
以天鵝絨般的華麗收尾
description.ja:
It breaks in bright crescendo.
It climbs in warmth, declines in peace,
and ends in velvet splendor.
description.es:
It breaks in bright crescendo.
It climbs in warmth, declines in peace,
and ends in velvet splendor.
description.ko:
It breaks in bright crescendo.
It climbs in warmth, declines in peace,
and ends in velvet splendor.
description.ru:
It breaks in bright crescendo.
It climbs in warmth, declines in peace,
and ends in velvet splendor.

sub_title.ja: 流れる真っ赤なマグマ

description.en:
Every tinkle on the shingles
has an echo in the heart.
description.zh-Hans:
屋瓦上的每一声清响
在心中皆有长长回音
description.zh-Hant:
屋瓦上的每一聲清響
在心中皆有長長迴音
description.ja:
Every tinkle on the shingles
has an echo in the heart.
description.es:
Every tinkle on the shingles
has an echo in the heart.
description.ko:
Every tinkle on the shingles
has an echo in the heart.
description.ru:
Every tinkle on the shingles
has an echo in the heart.

sub_title.ja: 古い屋根の上に雨が落ちた
sub_title.es: La lluvia cae sobre el techo antiguo

description.en:
As I inhale the impalpable breezes that 
set in upon me.
As the ocean so mysterious rolls toward me closer and closer.
description.zh-Hans:
当我呼吸着身上那微不足道的微风
当如此神秘的海洋离我越来越近
description.zh-Hant:
當我呼吸著身上那微不足道的微風
當如此神祕的海洋離我越來越近
description.ja:
As I inhale the impalpable breezes that 
set in upon me.
As the ocean so mysterious rolls toward me closer and closer.
description.es:
As I inhale the impalpable breezes that 
set in upon me.
As the ocean so mysterious rolls toward me closer and closer.
description.ko:
As I inhale the impalpable breezes that 
set in upon me.
As the ocean so mysterious rolls toward me closer and closer.
description.ru:
As I inhale the impalpable breezes that 
set in upon me.
As the ocean so mysterious rolls toward me closer and closer.

sub_title.es: El mar bajo la luz de la luna

description.en:
Its torrent dashes down
three thousand feet from high,
I wonder if it's Milky Way that falls from the sky.
description.zh-Hans:
千岩泉洒落
万壑树萦回
description.zh-Hant:
千巖泉灑落
萬壑樹縈迴
description.ja:
Its torrent dashes down
three thousand feet from high,
I wonder if it's Milky Way that falls from the sky.
description.es:
Its torrent dashes down
three thousand feet from high,
I wonder if it's Milky Way that falls from the sky.
description.ko:
Its torrent dashes down
three thousand feet from high,
I wonder if it's Milky Way that falls from the sky.
description.ru:
Its torrent dashes down
three thousand feet from high,
I wonder if it's Milky Way that falls from the sky.

sub_title.ja: 滝が山から流れ落ちてくる
sub_title.es: La cascada cae de las montañas

description.en:
To know of nights before or after.
The little while that we may last.
description.zh-Hans:
我们活过的刹那
前后皆是暗夜
description.zh-Hant:
我們活過的剎那
前後皆是暗夜
description.ja:
To know of nights before or after.
The little while that we may last.
description.es:
To know of nights before or after.
The little while that we may last.
description.ko:
To know of nights before or after.
The little while that we may last.
description.ru:
To know of nights before or after.
The little while that we may last.

description.en:
I miss more that stillness at bird-call
than some things that were to fail later.
description.zh-Hans:
我更怀念鸟鸣时的那份寂静
而非那日后即将逝去的事物
description.zh-Hant:
我更懷念鳴唱時的那份寂靜
而非那日後即將逝去的事物
description.ja:
I miss more that stillness at bird-call
than some things that were to fail later.
description.es:
I miss more that stillness at bird-call
than some things that were to fail later.
description.ko:
I miss more that stillness at bird-call
than some things that were to fail later.
description.ru:
I miss more that stillness at bird-call
than some things that were to fail later.

sub_title.ja: 芝生から聞こえる虫の囁き

description.en:
Don't tell me the moon is shining;
show me the glint of light on broken glass.
description.zh-Hans:
不必说月色如何明亮
请让我看见碎玻璃上的皎洁月光
description.zh-Hant:
不必說月色如何明亮
請讓我看見碎玻璃上的皎潔月光
description.ja:
Don't tell me the moon is shining;
show me the glint of light on broken glass.
description.es:
Don't tell me the moon is shining;
show me the glint of light on broken glass.
description.ko:
Don't tell me the moon is shining;
show me the glint of light on broken glass.
description.ru:
Не говори мне про свет луны; 
лучше покажи мне, как лунный свет мерцает в треснутом бокале.

sub_title.en: A quiet moon in the sky
sub_title.ja: 空に掛かっている静かな月
sub_title.es: Una luna tranquila en el cielo

description.en:
As I dart on through dim greyness,
I encounter clouds of cosmic dust.
description.zh-Hans:
当我穿过暗淡的灰色时
我遇到了宇宙尘埃云
description.zh-Hant:
當我穿過暗淡的灰色時
我遇到了宇宙塵埃雲
description.ja:
As I dart on through dim greyness,
I encounter clouds of cosmic dust.
description.es:
As I dart on through dim greyness,
I encounter clouds of cosmic dust.
description.ko:
As I dart on through dim greyness,
I encounter clouds of cosmic dust.
description.ru:
As I dart on through dim greyness,
I encounter clouds of cosmic dust.

description.en:
The good tree with its voice,
of a mountain stream,
knows my steps. 
It, too, hushes.
description.zh-Hans:
树林带着山涧的溪水声
分辨出我的脚步
它，同样，悄无声息
description.zh-Hant:
樹林帶著山澗的溪水聲
分辨出我的腳步
它，同樣，悄無聲息
description.ja:
The good tree with its voice,
of a mountain stream,
knows my steps. 
It, too, hushes.
description.es:
The good tree with its voice,
of a mountain stream,
knows my steps. 
It, too, hushes.
description.ko:
The good tree with its voice,
of a mountain stream,
knows my steps. 
It, too, hushes.
description.ru:
The good tree with its voice,
of a mountain stream,
knows my steps. 
It, too, hushes.

sub_title.es: Agua que fluye entre el valle

description.en:
In the wet window of the night train,
A reflection of colors of the city,
In the valley.
description.zh-Hans:
雨湿夜车的窗里 
映照出来
山间市镇的灯光颜色
description.zh-Hant:
雨溼夜車的窗裡 
映照出來
山間市鎮的燈光顏色
description.ja:
In the wet window of the night train,
A reflection of colors of the city,
In the valley.
description.es:
In the wet window of the night train,
A reflection of colors of the city,
In the valley.
description.ko:
In the wet window of the night train,
A reflection of colors of the city,
In the valley.
description.ru:
In the wet window of the night train,
A reflection of colors of the city,
In the valley.

sub_title.en: In a car while raining outside
sub_title.es: En un coche  mientras llueve afuera
sub_title.ru: В машине во время дождя на улице

description.en:
When the night hurries the late home-corner.
And the air grows softer, and scraps of tunes.
description.zh-Hans:
当夜幕在门户间垂下
当空气变得温柔，曲调渐渐飘走
description.zh-Hant:
當夜幕在門戶間垂下
當空氣變得溫柔，曲調漸漸飄走
description.ja:
When the night hurries the late home-corner.
And the air grows softer, and scraps of tunes.
description.es:
When the night hurries the late home-corner.
And the air grows softer, and scraps of tunes.
description.ko:
When the night hurries the late home-corner.
And the air grows softer, and scraps of tunes.
description.ru:
When the night hurries the late home-corner.
And the air grows softer, and scraps of tunes.

sub_title.ja: 静かな街路を通り過ぎる

description.en:
Under the harvest moon,
when the soft silver drips shimmering over the garden nights.
description.zh-Hans:
在丰盈的月亮下面
当银光闪烁轻柔地洒向园中的暗夜
description.zh-Hant:
在豐盈的月亮下面
當銀光閃爍輕柔地灑向園中的暗夜
description.ja:
Under the harvest moon,
when the soft silver drips shimmering over the garden nights.
description.es:
Under the harvest moon,
when the soft silver drips shimmering over the garden nights.
description.ko:
Under the harvest moon,
when the soft silver drips shimmering over the garden nights.
description.ru:
Under the harvest moon,
when the soft silver drips shimmering over the garden nights.

description.en:
The bird singing through the red tree.
Drop fruits off.
description.zh-Hans:
庭前红树清秋鸟
闲听落果声
description.zh-Hant:
庭前紅樹清秋鳥
閒聽落果聲
description.ja: 鳥啼いて 赤き木の実を こぼしけり.
description.es:
The bird singing through the red tree.
Drop fruits off.
description.ko:
The bird singing through the red tree.
Drop fruits off.
description.ru:
The bird singing through the red tree.
Drop fruits off.

description.en:
We are spendthrifts with words,
We squander them,
Toss them like pennies in the air.
description.zh-Hans:
我们挥霍着言语
我们浪费了它们
把它们像硬币一样扔到空中
description.zh-Hant:
我們揮霍著言語
我們浪費了它們
把它們像硬幣一樣扔到空中
description.ja:
We are spendthrifts with words,
We squander them,
Toss them like pennies in the air.
description.es:
We are spendthrifts with words,
We squander them,
Toss them like pennies in the air.
description.ko:
We are spendthrifts with words,
We squander them,
Toss them like pennies in the air.
description.ru:
We are spendthrifts with words,
We squander them,
Toss them like pennies in the air.

sub_title.ja: インスピレーション入力中

description.en:
Go, then, I wish you a safe journey,
wish you strong bridges and bright tunnels.
description.zh-Hans:
去吧，但愿你一路平安
桥都坚固，隧道都光明
description.zh-Hant:
去吧，但願你一路平安
橋都堅固，隧道都光明
description.ja:
Go, then, I wish you a safe journey,
wish you strong bridges and bright tunnels.
description.es:
Go, then, I wish you a safe journey,
wish you strong bridges and bright tunnels.
description.ko:
Go, then, I wish you a safe journey,
wish you strong bridges and bright tunnels.
description.ru:
Go, then, I wish you a safe journey,
wish you strong bridges and bright tunnels.

sub_title.ja: 未知なる場所へと向かう遅い列車
sub_title.es: Tren lento a un lugar desconocido
sub_title.ko: 완행 기차를 타서 미지한 곳으로 가고 있습니다
sub_title.ru: Медленный поезд едет в неизвестном направлении

description.en:
The nightly fireworks,
went on and on,
as at a party.
description.zh-Hans:
夜晚的烟火
一再地持续
犹如一个宴会
description.zh-Hant:
夜晚的煙火
一再地持續
猶如一個宴會
description.ja:
The nightly fireworks,
went on and on,
as at a party.
description.es:
The nightly fireworks,
went on and on,
as at a party.
description.ko:
The nightly fireworks,
went on and on,
as at a party.
description.ru:
The nightly fireworks,
went on and on,
as at a party.

sub_title.ja: 一瞬にして消え去る焔

description.en:
That your feet are rounding the road,
stones and he keeps asking about the sea.
description.zh-Hans:
由于河流
我的双足磨圆了
路上的每一颗石子
依然在打听大海的下落
description.zh-Hant:
由於河流
我的雙足磨圓了
路上的每一顆石子
依然在打聽大海的下落
description.ja:
That your feet are rounding the road,
stones and he keeps asking about the sea.
description.es:
That your feet are rounding the road,
stones and he keeps asking about the sea.
description.ko:
That your feet are rounding the road,
stones and he keeps asking about the sea.
description.ru:
That your feet are rounding the road,
stones and he keeps asking about the sea.

description.en:
Who brought a bowl of warmth
that soothed the old wounds in your stomach.
description.zh-Hans:
有谁端来一碗热暖
熨贴你宵来酸苦的胸膛
description.zh-Hant:
有誰端來一碗熱暖
熨貼你宵來酸苦的胸膛
description.ja:
Who brought a bowl of warmth
that soothed the old wounds in your stomach.
description.es:
Who brought a bowl of warmth
that soothed the old wounds in your stomach.
description.ko:
Who brought a bowl of warmth
that soothed the old wounds in your stomach.
description.ru:
Who brought a bowl of warmth
that soothed the old wounds in your stomach.

sub_title.en: Enjoy the supper, watch the crowd
sub_title.es: Cena de medianoche en la calle

description.en:
The fair breeze blew, the white foam flew.
The furrow followed free.
description.zh-Hans:
楝花风起漾微波
野渡舟轻客自过
description.zh-Hant:
楝花風起漾微波
野渡舟輕客自過
description.ja:
The fair breeze blew, the white foam flew.
The furrow followed free.
description.es:
The fair breeze blew, the white foam flew.
The furrow followed free.
description.ko:
The fair breeze blew, the white foam flew.
The furrow followed free.
description.ru:
The fair breeze blew, the white foam flew.
The furrow followed free.

description.en:
Give me books, fruit,
french wine,
and fine weather.
description.zh-Hans:
给我书本、水果
和法国酒
以及好天气
description.zh-Hant:
給我書本、水果
和法國酒
以及好天氣
description.ja:
Give me books, fruit,
french wine,
and fine weather.
description.es:
Give me books, fruit,
french wine,
and fine weather.
description.ko:
Give me books, fruit,
french wine,
and fine weather.
description.ru:
Give me books, fruit,
french wine,
and fine weather.

description.en:
Wind-racer, cloud-chaser, nowhere.
In the illimitable air, do you not aspire.
description.zh-Hans:
在无边的空气里
有你追风逐云的渴望
description.zh-Hant:
在無邊的空氣里
有你追風逐雲的渴望
description.ja:
Wind-racer, cloud-chaser, nowhere
In the illimitable air, do you not aspire
description.es:

sub_title.es: Un vuelo que cae el sol del atardecer

description.en:
The breeze and the dawn will flourish again
when you return, as if beneath your step.
Between flowers and sills, the cats will know.
description.zh-Hans:
当你回来，微风和日出将诞生于你的脚下
在花和窗台之间，猫会知道它
description.zh-Hant:
當你回來，微風和日出將誕生於你的腳下
在花和窗臺之間，貓會知道它
description.ja:
The breeze and the dawn will flourish again
when you return, as if beneath your step.
Between flowers and sills, the cats will know.
description.es:
The breeze and the dawn will flourish again
when you return, as if beneath your step.
Between flowers and sills, the cats will know.
description.ko:

description.ru:

when you return, as if beneath your step.

sub_title.en: A cat lies in an armchair lazily
sub_title.ja: のらくらとアームチェアに横たわっている猫
sub_title.es: Un gato descansa perezosamente en un sillón

description.en:
An old silent pond.
A frog jumps into the pond.
Splash! Silence again.
description.zh-Hans:
古潭蛙跃入
止水起清音
description.zh-Hant:
古潭蛙躍入
止水起清音
description.ja:
古池や  
蛙飛びこむ
水の音
description.es:
An old silent pond.
A frog jumps into the pond.
Splash! Silence again.
description.ko:
An old silent pond.
A frog jumps into the pond.
Splash! Silence again.
description.ru:
An old silent pond.
A frog jumps into the pond.
Splash! Silence again.

description.en:
By opening anywhere, a drop. 
And its story reappear.
description.zh-Hans:
水滴在随处展开
波纹间浮现久违的故事
description.zh-Hant:
水滴在隨處展開
波紋間浮現久違的故事
description.ja:
By opening anywhere, a drop. 
And its story reappear.
description.es:
By opening anywhere, a drop. 
And its story reappear.
description.ko:
By opening anywhere, a drop. 
And its story reappear.
description.ru:
By opening anywhere, a drop. 
And its story reappear.

sub_title.es: Gotas de lluvia que revuelven las ondas

description.en:
Listen, my heart,
to the whispers of the world.
description.zh-Hans:
静静地听，我的心呀
听那世界的低语
description.zh-Hant:
靜靜地聽，我的心呀
聽那世界的低語
description.ja:
Listen, my heart,
to the whispers of the world.
description.es:
Listen, my heart,
to the whispers of the world.
description.ko:
Listen, my heart,
to the whispers of the world.
description.ru:
Listen, my heart,
to the whispers of the world.

sub_title.ja: 人が行き来している広場
